name: src/eutils.js
EUtilsSingleton
description: A utilities class

unknown.tagValue: EUtilsSingleton
EUtils does not have a license at this time. For licensing contact the author

https://github.com/doubleactii

name: version
description: The version of the library

name: transitions
description: Object storing all color objects being transitioned at the moment

name: storedIDs
description: An array storing all the reserved unique IDS

name: decimalRand
description: Generates a random decimal number between two numbers with a specified number of decimal places.

unknown.tagValue: {number} A random decimal number between the two numbers with the specified number of decimal places.

params.name: pNum1
params.description: The first number to use for generating the random decimal number.

params.name: pNum2
params.description: The second number to use for generating the random decimal number.

params.name: pPlaces
params.description: The number of decimal places to include in the generated random decimal number. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

return.description: A random decimal number between the two numbers with the specified number of decimal places.

name: rand
description: Generates a random decimal number between two numbers with a specified number of decimal places.

unknown.tagValue: {number} A random decimal number between the two numbers with the specified number of decimal places.

params.name: pNum1
params.description: The first number to use for generating the random decimal number.

params.name: pNum2
params.description: The second number to use for generating the random decimal number.

return.description: A random decimal number between the two numbers with the specified number of decimal places.

name: getPercentage
description: Calculates the percentage of a value relative to a total value.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The percentage of the value relative to the total value.

params.name: pValue
params.description: The value to calculate the percentage of.

params.name: pTotalValue
params.description: The total value to calculate the percentage relative to.

return.description: The percentage of the value relative to the total value.

name: clamp
description: Clamps a number between a minimum and maximum value.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The clamped number between the minimum and maximum values.

params.name: pNumber
params.description: The number to clamp.

params.name: pMin
params.description: The minimum value to clamp the number to. Defaults to 0 if not provided.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value to clamp the number to. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

return.description: The clamped number between the minimum and maximum values.

name: lerp
description: Linearly interpolates between two values by a specified amount.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The interpolated value between the start and end values based on the specified amount.

params.name: pStart
params.description: The start value to interpolate from.

params.name: pEnd
params.description: The end value to interpolate to.

params.name: pAmount
params.description: The amount to interpolate between the start and end values.

return.description: The interpolated value between the start and end values based on the specified amount.

name: flooredLerp
description: Linearly interpolates between two values by a specified amount and returns the result as a floored integer.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The interpolated value between the start and end values based on the specified amount, rounded down to the nearest integer.

params.name: pStart
params.description: The start value to interpolate from.

params.name: pEnd
params.description: The end value to interpolate to.

params.name: pAmount
params.description: The amount to interpolate between the start and end values.

return.description: The interpolated value between the start and end values based on the specified amount, rounded down to the nearest integer.

name: round
description: Rounds a number to a specified number of decimal places.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The rounded number to the specified number of decimal places.

params.name: pNumber
params.description: The number to round.

params.name: pPlace
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

return.description: The rounded number to the specified number of decimal places.

name: normalize
description: Normalizes a value between a minimum and maximum value.

unknown.tagValue:
{number} The normalized value between 0 and 1 based on the input value's position between the minimum and maximum values.
If the difference between pMax and pMin is 0, returns 1 to avoid dividing by zero.

params.name: pVal
params.description: The value to normalize.

params.name: pMin
params.description: The minimum value for normalization.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value for normalization.

return.description:
The normalized value between 0 and 1 based on the input value's position between the minimum and maximum values.
If the difference between pMax and pMin is 0, returns 1 to avoid dividing by zero.

name: within
description: Checks if a value is within a range of minimum and maximum values (inclusive).

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if the value is within the range (inclusive), false otherwise.

params.name: pVal
params.description: The value to check.

params.name: pMin
params.description: The minimum value of the range to check against.

params.name: pMax
params.description: The maximum value of the range to check against.

return.description: True if the value is within the range (inclusive), false otherwise.

name: formatIntegerWithCommas
description: Formats a number by rounding it to the nearest integer and adding commas to separate thousands places.

unknown.tagValue: {string} A string representation of the formatted number.

params.name: pNum
params.description: The number to format.

return.description: A string representation of the formatted number.

name: degreesToRadians
description: Converts degrees to radians.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle in radians.

params.name: pDegrees
params.description: The angle in degrees.

return.description: The angle in radians.

name: radiansToDegrees
description: Converts radians to degrees.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle in degrees.

params.name: pRadians
params.description: The angle in radians.

return.description: The angle in degrees.

name: pick
description: Returns a random element from the given array.

unknown.tagValue: {*} A random element from the array.

params.name: pArray
params.description: The input array.

return.description: A random element from the array.

name: prob
description:
Returns true with probability proportional to the given number.
The higher the number, the higher the chance of returning true.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} - Returns true or false, based on the probability value.

params.name: pChance
params.description: The probability value, between 0 and 100 (inclusive).

return.description: Returns true or false, based on the probability value.

name: getInverseDir
description: Gets the inverse direction of the direction passed

unknown.tagValue: {string} The inverse direction

params.name: pDir
params.description: The direction to get the inverse of.

return.description: The inverse direction

name: getAngleFromDir
description: Calculates the angle (in radians) from a given direction.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The angle (in radians) associated with the given direction.

params.name: pDir
params.description: The direction to calculate the angle from.

return.description: The angle (in radians) associated with the given direction.

throws.description: Throws an error if the direction is not recognized.

name: generateID
description: Generates a unique id

unknown.tagValue: A unique ID

params.name: pIDLength
params.description: The length of the ID to create

return.description: A unique ID

name: decimalToHex
description: Converts a color in decimal format into hex format

unknown.tagValue: The decimal color converted into hex format

params.name: pDecimal
params.description: The color in decimal format

params.name: pChars
params.description: The length to make the hex string

return.description: The decimal color converted into hex format

name: addIntensity
description: Add intensity to this color to get a brighter or dimmer effect

params.name: pColor
params.description: Color in hex format or decimal format

params.name: pPercent
params.description: The percent of brightness to add to this color

name: grabColor
description: Convert a color to different formats or get a random color

unknown.tagValue:
{ColorObject} A color object with various different export options.
hex, hexTagless, rgb, rgbArray, rgbObject, rgbNormal, decimal formats.

params.name: pSwitch
params.description:
A hex string representing a color (with or without the tag)
A color formatted in the decimal format. Or the r value of a rgb color.

params.name: g
params.description: g value of a rgb color

params.name: b
params.description: b value of a rgb color

return.description:
A color object with various different export options.
hex, hexTagless, rgb, rgbArray, rgbObject, rgbNormal, decimal formats.

name: getRandomColor
description: Gets a random color

unknown.tagValue: {string} A random color in the hex format

return.description: A random color in the hex format

name: getRandomColorBetween
description: Gets a random color between two colors

unknown.tagValue: {string} A random color in the decimal format

params.name: pColor1
params.description: The first color to get a color between

params.name: pColor2
params.description: The second color to get a color between

params.name: pAmount
params.description:
The closer the random color will be to either input colors on a range of 0-1
0 to 0.5 (closer to pColor1)
0.5 to 1 (closer to pColor2)

return.description: A random color in the decimal format

name: transitionColor
description: Transition a color to another color in pDuration time.

unknown.tagValue: An ID that references this transition to be passed to cancelTransition to stop an ongoing transition.

params.name: pInstance
params.description:
The instance to transition it's color property.
pInstance's color will be transitioned either via pInstance.color = newColor
or
pInstance.color.tint = newColor (if the color is defined as an object)

params.name: pStartColor
params.description: The start color

params.name: pEndColor
params.description: The end color

params.name: pDuration
params.description: The duration of the transition

params.name: pIterativeCallback
params.description: Callback to call every tick of the transition

params.name: pEndCallback
params.description: Callback to call at the end of the transition

return.description: An ID that references this transition to be passed to cancelTransition to stop an ongoing transition.

name: cancelTransitionColor
description: Cancels an ongoing transition

params.name: pID
params.description: The ID of the ongoing transition to cancel

name: getPointRotated
description: Calculates the position of a point after rotating it around a center point by a given angle.

unknown.tagValue: {object} An object with the rotated point's new x and y coordinates.

params.name: pRect
params.description:
The rectangle object to rotate the point around.
pRect.anchor.x and pRecent.anchor.y is used to control the "center" of the rectangle.

params.name: pTheta
params.description: The angle (in radians) to rotate the point by.

params.name: pPoint
params.description: The point object to rotate around the center of the rectangle.

params.name: pPoint.x
params.description: The x-coordinate of the point to rotate.

params.name: pPoint.y
params.description: The y-coordinate of the point to rotate.

return.description: An object with the rotated point's new x and y coordinates.

name: getPointsOfRotatedRect
description:
/**
Calculates the position of a rectangle's corner points and center point after rotating it around a center point by a given angle.

unknown.tagValue: {object} An object with the rotated rectangle's new corner points and center points.

params.name: pRect
params.description:
The rectangle object to rotate the point around.
pRect.anchor.x and pRecent.anchor.y is used to control the "center" of the rectangle.

params.name: pTheta
params.description: The angle (in radians) to rotate the point by.

return.description: An object with the rotated rectangle's new corner points and center points.

content:
# EUtils
A small plugin full of useful things.

#INCLUDE SCRIPT eutils.min.js

** Docs coming soon **
name: ./README.md
